com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Interface OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OAuthRequestAuthenticationBuilder<OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication>

    public interface OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder
extends OAuthRequestAuthenticationBuilder<OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication>
    Utility class to build PasswordGrantRequestBuilder instances.
    Since:
    1.0.RC7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Specifies the target Account Store to be used for the authentication token creation.
      OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder setLogin(String login)
      Specifies the login that will be used to create the authentication token.
      OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder setPassword(String password)
      Specifies the password that will be used to create the authentication token.

      • setAccountStore

        OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
        Specifies the target Account Store to be used for the authentication token creation.
        Parameters:
        accountStore - the sole specific accountStore where the provided credentials will be sought in order to authenticate this request.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
